Title: Stabilization of a fractional-order chain of integrators: A contraction-based approach
Abstract: © 2013 The authors. Published by Oxford University Press on behalf of the Institute of Mathematics and its Applications. All rights reserved.In this paper, stabilization of a chain of fractional-order integrators is attempted. The stability is proved using contraction analysis. A numerical example is presented to illustrate the proposed method.
